item.title: Fly tipping in private garden, 10th June
item.description:
This is the third time im reporting this as Hackney have told me the matter is resolved but the 2king size mattresses and other bits are still in my private garden. They were put there by a man and his kids. I called the police at the time. Please remove.

item.title: Soiled nappies all over underpass, 10th June
item.description:
The approach to the underpass under Nightingale Place and the underpass itself are covered in litter, including a large number of soiled nappies. This is disgusting and it is a risk to public health. Please clean it urgently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Common Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
